entry.headline: Wipro Announces Communication & Collaboration Solutions for Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2
entry.body: Solutions to provide efficient utilization of resources, single interface to access different communication devices BANGALORE, India--(Business Wire)-- Wipro Technologies, the global IT Services business of Wipro Limited (NYSE:WIT) today announced that it has developed Communication & Collaboration Solutions, which works with Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007. With the implementation of this version Wipro will provide customized domain specific solutions to customers that will enhance productivity, improve intra office communication significantly. Customers can now leverage the existing Exchange Server 2007 & telephony environments without any additional investments. The new release builds on the software-based unified communications solution with important new functionalities like dial-in audio conferencing bridge persistent group chat; Improved Software Development Kits; Audio, Video and IM Conferencing; Microsoft Office Live Meeting hosted on premise; Session and provides advanced call-management, routing, and monitoring tools. Wipro has deployed Office Communications Server 2007 to more than 80 customers. These organizations range in size from 10,000 to 80,000 employees. In case of a healthcare provider this solution will enable the physician to have access to internal portals for patient history, prescription test reports from a Windows handheld device or a computer. In addition to this a healthcare practitioner can see the presence of his/her colleagues on the portal and communicate with them using IM, audio or video. This offers faster and efficient communication and anywhere access critical for the healthcare industry. "Wipro Technologies takes advantage of the group chat, advanced communication features and advanced Software Development Kits in Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2, enabling customers to unify their communications systems and meet the growing demand for enhanced business collaboration," said Moz Hussain, director of the Unified Communications Group at Microsoft Corp. "Microsoft is excited to work with Wipro to demonstrate the value of software-powered unified communications solutions to our customers." "Customers are realizing the need for Communication & collaboration solution for improving employee productivity, increase operational efficiencies, and cut costs through reduced reliance on traditional telephony. Office Communications Server 2007 will provide our customers with lower costs, better call routing & monitoring, improved group collaboration & reduced telephony costs," said Madhusudhanan Vasu, General Manager, Technology Infrastructure Services, Wipro Technologies. About Wipro Wipro Technologies, a division of Wipro Limited (NYSE:WIT) is the first PCMM Level 5 and SEI CMM Level 5 certified global IT services organization. Wipro Technologies was recently assessed at Level 5 for CMMI V 1.2 across offshore and onsite development centers. Wipro is one of the largest product engineering and support service providers worldwide. Wipro provides comprehensive research and development services, IT solutions and services, including systems integration, information systems outsourcing, package implementation, software application development, and maintenance services to corporations globally. In the Indian market, Wipro is a leader in providing IT solutions and services for the corporate segment in India, offering system integration, network integration, software solutions and IT services. Wipro also has a profitable presence in niche market segments of consumer products and lighting. In the Asia-Pacific and Middle East markets, Wipro provides IT solutions and services for global corporations. Wipro's ADS' are listed on the New York Stock Exchange, and its equity shares are listed in India on the Stock Exchange - Mumbai, and the National Stock Exchange. For more information, please visit our websites at www.wipro.com and www.wiprocorporate.com. Forward-looking and Cautionary Statements Certain statements in this release concerning our future growth prospects are forward-looking statements, which involve a number of risks, and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from those in such forward-looking statements. The risks and uncertainties relating to these statements include, but are not limited to, risks and uncertainties regarding fluctuations in our earnings, revenue and profits, our ability to generate and manage growth, intense competition in IT services, our ability to maintain our cost advantage, wage increases in India, our ability to attract and retain highly skilled professionals, time and cost overruns on fixed-price, fixed-time frame contracts, client concentration, restrictions on immigration, our ability to manage our international operations, reduced demand for technology in our key focus areas, disruptions in telecommunication networks, our ability to successfully complete and integrate potential acquisitions, liability for damages on our service contracts, the success of the companies in which we make strategic investments, withdrawal of fiscal governmental incentives, political instability, war, legal restrictions on raising capital or acquiring companies outside India, unauthorized use of our intellectual property, and general economic conditions affecting our business and industry. Additional risks that could affect our future operating results are more fully described in our filings with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission. These filings are available at www.sec.gov. We may, from time to time, make additional written and oral forward-looking statements, including statements contained in the company`s filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission and our reports to shareholders. We do not undertake to update any forward-looking statement that may be made from time to time by us or on our behalf. Media Contacts: Wipro Technologies India: Radhika Mahadevan Wipro Technologies +91-9945042603 radhika.mahadevan@wipro.com or Purvika Anand Gutenberg Communications +91-9901134441 purvika@gutenbergpr.com or US: Lavanya DJ Gutenberg Communications + 212-239-8740 lavanya@gutenbergpr.com or Eric Belove Wipro Technologies + 1 732-216-6242 eric.belove@wipro.com or UK: Rahul Kadavakolu Wipro Technologies +44 792 020 5496 rahul.kadavakolu@wipro.com or Shalini Siromani Gutenberg Communications +44 79 6066 3200 shalini@gutenbergpr.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: VOX Network Solutions Achieves Voice Specialization in the Microsoft Partner Program in Readiness for the Launch of Microsoft`s Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2
entry.body: SOUTH SAN FRANCISCO, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- VOX Network Solutions, a Microsoft Certified Partner, today announced that it has attained the Voice Specialization in the unified communications competency of the Microsoft Partner Program in preparation for the launch of Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 R2. Office Communications Server 2007 R2 will offer VOX customers streamlined communications that bring breakthrough productivity and greater cost savings. "Our Customers come to us for consistent high-quality expertise in the most up to date communications technologies because we provide a level of support that insures flawless execution," says Scott Landis, President and CEO, VOX. "Our recent Voice Specialization achievement is another example of our vow to support leading edge applications that deliver measureable benefits to our customers. By working with Microsoft, we feel confident that our new certification and commitment to customer satisfaction will provide users of Office Communications Server 2007 R2 with enhanced functionality and significant value." "VOX Network Solutions believes in Microsoft`s vision for unified communications and enabling people to find and collaborate with colleagues right from the applications they already know and use," said Moz Hussain, Director of the Unified Communications Group at Microsoft Corp. "The potential for VOX to use Office Communications Server 2007 R2 to offer customer solutions with significant productivity and cost savings benefits are paramount in the current economic climate." About VOX Network Solutions VOX Network Solutions, Inc. is a leading sole source provider of converged voice and data infrastructure solutions and services for enterprise businesses. Headquartered in the San Francisco Bay Area, VOX offers a complete range of voice and data applications and services including planning and design, installation and integration, and maintenance and monitoring. For more information, go to www.voxnetworksolutions.com. All Products and company names herein may be trademarks of their respective owners. VOX Network Solutions Nancy Price, 650-989-1015 nprice@voxns.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Quest Software Supports Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2
entry.body: Solidifies Its Unified Communications Leadership as Microsoft Gold Certified Partner ALISO VIEJO, Calif.--(Business Wire)-- Quest Software, Inc. (Nasdaq: QSFT) today affirmed its commitment to Microsoft`s unified communications strategy by announcing its participation as a Gold Certified partner in the launch of Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 (R2). Today`s virtual event will offer Quest the opportunity to showcase its end-to-end management and compliance solutions that support this advanced release. "Quest has made significant investments in products that enable organizations to master their unified communications environments," said David Waugh, vice president of Unified Communications and Collaboration, Quest Software. "Our solutions complement the functionality of Office Communications Server 2007 R2, offering users the ability to streamline communications and effectively manage their infrastructures." Quest experts will be accessible through the company`s virtual booth to offer insight into industry topics and trends, as well as information about Quest solutions that support Office Communications Server 2007 R2 and its customers. Quest`s portfolio of solutions includes: * Spotlight on Messaging, a real-time diagnostics and troubleshooting tool * MessageStats, a messaging reporting and analysis solution * Policy Authority for Unified Communications, a product specializing in instant messaging compliance, data leak protection and security * Archive Manager, a repository for compliance archiving and e-discovery of e-mail, instant messaging, file system and Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007 data * Migrator for SameTime, a migration solution from IBM SameTime to Office Communications Server 2007 R2 coming in 2009 "Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 is creating tremendous opportunities in the unified communications marketplace for companies like Quest Software," said Eric Swift, senior director of the Microsoft Unified Communications Group at Microsoft Corp. "We look forward to working with Quest to reduce communications chaos and increase business productivity for our mutual customers." Quest`s virtual booth will also include presentations, a demo video and additional collateral information highlighting the company`s extensive Office Communications Server 2007 R2 expertise. To attend the virtual launch event, and to visit Quest`s virtual booth, register at http://www.microsoft.com/communicationsserver/en/us/default.aspx. About Quest Software, Inc. Quest Software, Inc., a leading enterprise systems management vendor, delivers innovative products that help organizations get more performance and productivity from their applications, databases, Windows infrastructure and virtual environments. Quest also provides customers with client management through its ScriptLogic subsidiary and server virtualization management through its Vizioncore subsidiary. Through a deep expertise in IT operations and a continued focus on what works best, Quest helps more than 100,000 customers worldwide meet higher expectations for enterprise IT. Quest`s Unified Communications and Collaboration solutions simplify, automate and secure Microsoft Exchange Server 2007, Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 2007, Windows Server, Office Communications Server 2007 and BlackBerry Server. Quest is the Microsoft Global ISV Partner of the year for 2004 and 2007. Quest Software can be found in offices around the globe and at www.quest.com. Quest, Quest Software, Spotlight, MessageStats and the Quest logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Quest Software in the United States and certain other countries. All other names mentioned herein may be trademarks of their respective owners. Web Links Referenced in this Release: Quest Software, Inc.: www.quest.com Virtual event: www.microsoft.com/communicationsserver/en/us/default.aspx Diagnostics: www.quest.com/spotlight-on-messaging/ Reporting and analysis: www.quest.com/messagestats/ Compliance, data leak protection and security: www.quest.com/policy-authority-for-uc/ Compliance archiving: www.quest.com/archive-manager/ Quest Software, Inc. Sara O`Malley, 614-726-4768 sara.omalley@quest.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Gold Systems Announces Implementation Services for Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2
entry.body: Gold Systems Brings Speech Application Expertise to Customers Seeking Productivity and Cost Advantages with Unified Communications BOULDER, Colo.--(Business Wire)-- Gold Systems, a developer of voice-powered software applications for Global 1000 companies, today announced that it is now providing implementation services for the unified communications capabilities of Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 (R2) and voice applications which leverage its built-in speech technologies. The new release brings the further benefits of productivity increases and cost savings that were introduced with the first version of Office Communications Server 2007. It is part of Microsoft unified communications technologies, which bridge the divide between computers and telephones, delivering voice software that does more than a network PBX, at much less cost. Gold Systems provides software development and implementation services to help companies utilize the features of Microsoft unified communications technologies. Gold Systems integrates Office Communications Server 2007 R2 and other Microsoft software with customers` telephony infrastructure, including PBXs, VoIP services, and mobile devices. This combination helps companies save money and reduce administrative burdens by consolidating hardware and software. The solution also helps companies improve productivity by providing on-site and mobile employees with integrated, easy-to-use messaging and anywhere access. "Gold Systems` customers come to us for our expertise in deploying unified communications solutions quickly and trouble free," said Terry Gold, president and CEO of Gold Systems. "We have been using Office Communications Server 2007 R2 in-house for several months, and have demonstrated the benefits of the new offering in significantly driving down our operating costs - while achieving breakthrough productivity advantages. We feel confident that Office Communications Server 2007 R2 will allow us to add tremendous value to our customers with new unified communications tools." Office Communications Server 2007 R2 also includes interactive voice response (IVR) technology that serves as a built-in platform for speech-driven applications. Gold Systems offers a suite of products, designed to enhance security and productivity, as well as expertise in developing custom contact center and self-service solutions which work with the platform. Gold Systems has designed and built the speech-enabled applications powering Microsoft`s primary customer service solution at 1-800-MICROSOFT using Office Communications Server 2007, as well as similar solutions for other customers. "The combination of Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 and Gold Systems` voice self-service applications provides a powerful new way for people to collaborate and offers customers a rich and integrated communications experience," said Eric Swift, senior director of the Microsoft Unified Communications Group at Microsoft Corp. "Gold Systems is adding significant value to enterprise communications and enabling businesses to better connect people, information and business processes." As a member of the Microsoft Unified Communications Voice Partner Program, Gold Systems will continue to help customers deploy solutions based on Office Communications Server 2007 R2 and other Microsoft unified communications technologies. About Gold Systems Through its award-winning products and services, Gold Systems helps its customers identify where productivity can be improved with voice-driven solutions. The company`s unified communications implementation services, as well as its self-service speech recognition solutions, allow businesses to improve productivity and profitability. Gold Systems is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner. Since 1991, Gold Systems software has automated more than 1 billion telephone calls around the world. More information about Gold Systems can be found at www.goldsys.com or by calling 303-447-2774 and saying "information." The names of actual companies and products mentioned herein may be the trademarks of their respective owners. Gold Systems Bill Green, 303-786-7000 ext. 2207 bgreen@metzger.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: FaceTime Communications Announces Enhanced Security and Compliance for Microsoft Office Communications Server Release 2
entry.body: BELMONT, CA, Feb 03 (MARKET WIRE) -- FaceTime Communications, a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner in the Microsoft Partner Program, today announced that its line of Unified Security Gateway (USG) and IMAuditor products support the Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 (R2) with enhanced compliance and management capabilities. FaceTime's IMAuditor and Unified Security Gateway products are integrated with Office Communications Server 2007 R2 to provide protection from in-bound malware, out-bound information leakage and to insure corporate and regulatory compliance, and are extensible to other communications modalities including Voice over IP and Web conferencing in addition to instant messaging. New to FaceTime's support of Office Communications Server 2007 R2, is the ability to create ethical boundaries for audio conferencing, full security and compliance for Group Chat, support for Access Edge Proxy and associated logging and reporting enhancements. FaceTime's highly scalable architecture for unified communications, developed with support from Microsoft, insures that even in the event of a server failure, policies are enforced and communications continue to be archived for compliance and audit purposes. This architecture protects organizations across heterogeneous environment of public IM, Web 2.0 and unified communications applications. Through FaceTime's continued support of both Microsoft Office Live Communications Server and Office Communications Server 2007 R2, enterprise organizations can be assured of enhanced security and management and consistent policy enforcement across multiple unified communications modalities. "Unified communications presents new challenges in terms of security, policy management and compliance, because the nature of collaboration increases the ways that information can travel within and outside the organization," said Frank Cabri, vice president of marketing and product management for FaceTime Communications. "Working closely with Microsoft, FaceTime provides a single platform for enforcing security and compliance policies consistently across instant messaging, conferencing and voice communications on the Microsoft Office Communications Server platform." "The combination of Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 and FaceTime's USG and IMAuditor provides a powerful new way for people to collaborate and offers customers a rich and integrated communications experience," said Eric Swift, senior director of the Microsoft Unified Communications Group at Microsoft Corp. "FaceTime is adding significant value to enterprise communications and enabling businesses to better connect people, information and business processes." About FaceTime Communications FaceTime Communications enables the safe and productive use of instant messaging, Web usage and Unified Communications platforms. Ranked number one in worldwide instant messaging management revenues by IDC for five consecutive years, FaceTime's award-winning solutions are used by more than 1,000 customers for security, management and compliance of real-time communications. FaceTime supports or has strategic partnerships with all leading public and enterprise IM network providers, including AOL, Google, Microsoft, Yahoo!, Skype, IBM and Jabber. FaceTime is headquartered in Belmont, California. For more information visit http://www.facetime.com or call 888-349-FACE. The FaceForward blog, at http://blog.facetime.com, offers thoughts and opinions about the changing nature of Internet. FaceTime, FaceTime Communications, IMAuditor, FaceTime Unified Security Gateway, FaceTime Security Labs, SpywareGuide.com and the FaceTime logo are registered trademarks and trademarks of FaceTime Communications, Inc. Other trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners. entry.headline: Global Knowledge Launches Unified Communications Training Courses Integrating Cisco and Microsoft Technologies
entry.body: CARY, N.C.--(Business Wire)-- Global Knowledge, the worldwide leader in IT and Business training, today announced the availability of two new Unified Communications (UC) training courses integrating Cisco and Microsoft technologies. One course provides training on dial plan integration, while the other provides instruction on Presence server deployment, configuration, and integration. Both courses are application-oriented and emphasize hands-on training in real-world scenarios, allowing students to gain skills they can use immediately following class. In Cisco and Microsoft Dial Plan Integration (CMDPI),students will learn to design and implement a UC network with a complex dial plan, integrating Cisco Unified Communications Manager (CUCM) and Microsoft Office Communication Server (OCS). Students will learn the key features of both vendors` technologies, including CUCM and OCS architecture and dial plan components, along with dial plan troubleshooting. Incoming students should be familiar with PBX or IP Telephony administration and management, basic dial plan concepts, network protocols, Active Directory, and UC applications such as e-mail, voice mail, and presence. In Enhanced Cisco Presence with Microsoft Foundations (ECPMF), students will learn to implement a complete Cisco Presence solution leveraging the full capabilities of Cisco and Microsoft. Students will discover the key Presence architectural components, product features, and points of interoperability between the two vendor technologies. Students enrolling in this course should be familiar with CUCM, Microsoft Active Directory, Exchange Server 2003 Messaging, OCS 2007, network protocols, and UC applications. The new integrated Unified Communications training courses are available in our classrooms and as private, on-site courses that can be tailored to the needs of your organization. Learn more about our Cisco, Microsoft, and UC training courses and access white papers, web seminars, and podcasts at www.globalknowledge.com. About Global Knowledge Global Knowledge is the worldwide leader in IT and business training. We deliver via training centers, private facilities, and the Internet, enabling our customers to choose when, where, and how they want to receive training programs and learning services. Our more than 700 courses span foundational and specialized training and certifications. Founded in 1995, Global Knowledge employs more than 1,200 people worldwide and is headquartered in Cary, N.C. The company is owned by New York-based investment firm Welsh, Carson, Anderson, and Stowe. entry.headline: FaceTime Communications Announces Enhanced Security and Compliance for Microsoft Office Communications Server Release 2
entry.body: BELMONT, CA, Feb 03 (MARKET WIRE) -- FaceTime Communications, a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner in the Microsoft Partner Program, today announced that its line of Unified Security Gateway (USG) and IMAuditor products support the Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 (R2) with enhanced compliance and management capabilities. FaceTime's IMAuditor and Unified Security Gateway products are integrated with Office Communications Server 2007 R2 to provide protection from in-bound malware, out-bound information leakage and to insure corporate and regulatory compliance, and are extensible to other communications modalities including Voice over IP and Web conferencing in addition to instant messaging. New to FaceTime's support of Office Communications Server 2007 R2, is the ability to create ethical boundaries for audio conferencing, full security and compliance for Group Chat, support for Access Edge Proxy and associated logging and reporting enhancements. FaceTime's highly scalable architecture for unified communications, developed with support from Microsoft, insures that even in the event of a server failure, policies are enforced and communications continue to be archived for compliance and audit purposes. This architecture protects organizations across heterogeneous environment of public IM, Web 2.0 and unified communications applications. Through FaceTime's continued support of both Microsoft Office Live Communications Server and Office Communications Server 2007 R2, enterprise organizations can be assured of enhanced security and management and consistent policy enforcement across multiple unified communications modalities. "Unified communications presents new challenges in terms of security, policy management and compliance, because the nature of collaboration increases the ways that information can travel within and outside the organization," said Frank Cabri, vice president of marketing and product management for FaceTime Communications. "Working closely with Microsoft, FaceTime provides a single platform for enforcing security and compliance policies consistently across instant messaging, conferencing and voice communications on the Microsoft Office Communications Server platform." "The combination of Office Communications Server 2007 Release 2 and FaceTime's USG and IMAuditor provides a powerful new way for people to collaborate and offers customers a rich and integrated communications experience," said Eric Swift, senior director of the Microsoft Unified Communications Group at Microsoft Corp. "FaceTime is adding significant value to enterprise communications and enabling businesses to better connect people, information and business processes." About FaceTime Communications FaceTime Communications enables the safe and productive use of instant messaging, Web usage and Unified Communications platforms. Ranked number one in worldwide instant messaging management revenues by IDC for five consecutive years, FaceTime's award-winning solutions are used by more than 1,000 customers for security, management and compliance of real-time communications. FaceTime supports or has strategic partnerships with all leading public and enterprise IM network providers, including AOL, Google, Microsoft, Yahoo!, Skype, IBM and Jabber. FaceTime is headquartered in Belmont, California. For more information visit http://www.facetime.com or call 888-349-FACE. The FaceForward blog, at http://blog.facetime.com, offers thoughts and opinions about the changing nature of Internet. FaceTime, FaceTime Communications, IMAuditor, FaceTime Unified Security Gateway, FaceTime Security Labs, SpywareGuide.com and the FaceTime logo are registered trademarks and trademarks of FaceTime Communications, Inc. Other trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Media contact: Joshua Barnes A Edelman 650-762-2865 Email Contact Copyright 2009, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: JPMorgan's Dimon defends pay for "tough jobs"
entry.body:
NEW YORK Feb 3 (Reuters) - JPMorgan Chase Co (JPM.N) Chief Executive Jamie Dimon, weighing in on the firestorm over bonuses paid by banks who got taxpayer bailouts, defended paying staff for tough jobs.

Many executives, including Dimon, whose bank has taken $25 billion from the U.S. government's Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP), have said they will not seek a bonus for 2008 after the credit crisis that began more than a year ago spiraled into a global recession.

"Are banks to blame? Well, of course," said Dimon, but he warned against just blaming banks and bankers, noting that other players in financial markets, including U.S. consumers, had borrowed more than they held in assets.

Dimon told delegates at a conference that if there is a tough job to do at a company, a manager wants to know he can persuade his best person to do that job.

Referring to the theoretical tough job as "Vietnam," Dimon said he would want to support the person handling the role and be able to recognize that they have a difficult job.

Dimon said any investigation into executive pay should take different situations into account, rather than tarring all bankers with the same brush.

Dimon also noted that JPMorgan, along with other banks, paid most of its compensation to executives in stock and these executives have already seen their net worth plummet as the banks' share prices have fallen.

The KBW Bank index .BKX fell more than 50 percent in 2008, while JPMorgan's shares slid 27 percent.

Dimon in December joined a raft of bank executives including Citigroup Inc's Chief Executive Vikram Pandit and Morgan Stanley's Chief Executive John Mack in saying that he will not seek a bonus for 2008.

And executives at banks that received funds under the TARP agreed to follow rules limiting executive pay.

Shares in JPMorgan are down 20 percent so far this year and were down 4.6 percent to $24.04 in late Tuesday morning trading from Monday's close. (Reporting by Elinor Comlay; Editing by Tim Dobbyn)

FILED UNDER:

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Procter & Gamble sets guidance on $2 bln notes-IFR
entry.body:
NEW YORK Feb 3 (Reuters) - Procter Gamble Co (PG.N) set price guidance on its $2 billion two-part note sale, said IFR, a Thomson Reuters service.

The sale includes $750 million in six-year notes expected to yield about 170 basis points over U.S. Treasuries, according to IFR.

It also includes $1.25 billion in 10-year notes expected to yield about either plus or minus 187.5 basis points over Treasuries.

The joint lead managers on the offering are Deutsche Bank, HSBC Securities and JPMorgan. (Reporting by Caryn Trokie; Editing by Tom Hals)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: UPDATE 1-Mega Brands shares soar on Microsoft game deal
entry.body:
(Adds details, background, updates stock movement)

TORONTO Feb 3 (Reuters) - Shares of Mega Brands Inc MB.TO more than doubled on Tuesday after the toymaker said it had signed a global licensing agreement with Microsoft Game Studios (MSFT.O) to make construction toys for its Halo Wars video game.

The Montreal-based company's shares soared 123.1 percent to 87 Canadian cents by late morning on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

The deal will see Mega Brands develop construction toy sets based on the characters and vehicles of Halo Wars, an action strategy video game set in the future.

Financial terms of the deal were not announced.

The video game is set to hit stores shortly, with the Mega Brands products available beginning in June.

Despite the huge bump in the share price on Wednesday, Mega Brand stock is down almost 90 percent in the past year, after being battered by a toy recall.

"Definitely the last couple of years have been very tough for us, between recalls and the world economy, but this signals that we are turning the corner...," said company spokesman Harold Chizick.

"We have all the ingredients to say 2009 is a turnaround year for Mega."

The maker of construction toys, games and puzzles, arts and crafts, and stationery products, is still recovering from a recall of its Magnetix toys, which began in 2006 and expanded in 2007.

One child was killed and 27 others were seriously injured after swallowing small, powerful magnets that came loose.

The magnetic toys were acquired as part of Mega Brands' 2005 takeover of Rose Art.

In March 2008, the company announced two separate recalls after reports of magnets coming loose from several toys manufactured in China.

The company decided to downsize operations in the former Rose Art manufacturing facility in China and outsource production.

($1=$1.24 Canadian) (Reporting by Scott Anderson; editing by Rob Wilson)

entry.headline: ArcherPoint Announces First World-Wide Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 Implementation
entry.body: Microsoft Gold Certified Partner and customer participate in Technology Adaption Program (TAP) ATLANTA--(Business Wire)-- ArcherPoint, LLC, a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner specializing in Microsoft Dynamics solutions, today announced that it has completed the first implementation of Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 in the world. ArcherPoint helped Exhausto, a leading ventilation system supplier in North America and the Middle East, upgrade its Microsoft Dynamics NAV solution to take advantage of the new role-tailored user experience, Web services integration, and the introduction of the three-tier solution architecture in Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009. Both companies participated in the Technology Adaption Program (TAP), a unique program designed by Microsoft to provide an early opportunity for Partners and customers to leverage new Microsoft technologies and to provide real-world customer feedback on Microsoft pre-release products. In addition, Partners are trained directly by Microsoft and obtain deeper product knowledge, helping them implement better solutions. Participating Partners and customers enjoy benefits such as direct access to Microsoft domain experts, early product education, and an opportunity to influence the product through their feedback. "Being part of TAP has allowed us to work closely with the Microsoft development team prior to the final release, helping Microsoft improve the overall quality and usability of the product and helping us bring the first customer in the world live on the product," said Tommy Madsen, partner and co-founder of ArcherPoint. "The process has been beneficial not only to Microsoft, ArcherPoint, and Exhausto, but also to the future users of Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009." Taking advantage of the benefits of TAP, ArcherPoint implemented Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 and integrated it with Exhausto`s critical business systems. The implementation also included integrating with Microsoft Dynamics CRM and an upgraded version of the company`s proprietary FanCalc application. Additionally, ArcherPoint worked closely with Lanham Associates to upgrade and test on Dynamics NAV 2009 the latest release of their E-Ship Product, a Certified for Microsoft Dynamics NAV add-on shipping solution, and their Advanced Forecasting & Procurement solution, both built within Microsoft Dynamics NAV. "The enhancements in Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 will make it easier for us to provide reliable remote system access to employees worldwide, enabling us to pursue growth with more confidence," said Steen Hagensen, president of Exhausto. "Equally exciting, however, was our participation in the Microsoft Technology Adaption Program. Having the opportunity to be involved with a new product at so early a stage was an unforgettable and beneficial experience for our company." For Exhausto, one of the key enhancements to Microsoft Dynamics NAV is increased support for connecting critical business systems. The tight integration between the company`s proprietary FanCalc application and Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 made it possible to fully automate the conversion of bills of materials into sales orders. Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 delivers value-added technical advancements and integration with other Microsoft technology, lowering the cost of ownership and providing a greater return on investment. Customers can take advantage of new Web services offerings that make data and business logic within Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2009 available to other applications greatly simplifying integration with external applications. About ArcherPoint: ArcherPoint, LLC was founded in 2002 and is a leading provider of business applications based on proven Microsoft ERP tools. ArcherPoint designs, implements and supports solutions-from back office accounting and customer relationship management to manufacturing and distribution-through real world experience and a commitment to quality service. ArcherPoint helps companies throughout North America perform above and beyond their competition. www.archerpoint.com 866.343.4517 ext. 133 About Exhausto: Exhausto has more than 50 years experience within Ventilation and Chimney Draft Technology, and is market leader in these product ranges. Exhausto`s "Green Building" ventilation systems create the perfect indoor air quality in houses, apartment buildings, offices, schools, institutions, restaurants, hotels/resorts and sports facilities. www.us.exhausto.com ArcherPoint Suzanne Scanlan, 678-245-4521 sscanlan@archerpoint.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Fed hires JPMorgan as custodian for MBS buy program
entry.body:
NEW YORK Feb 3 (Reuters) - JPMorgan Chase Co (JPM.N), the second-largest U.S. bank by assets, on Tuesday said the Federal Reserve hired it as a custodian for its program to purchase up to $500 billion in guaranteed mortgage bonds.

The Fed had already named BlackRock Financial Management, Inc, Goldman Sachs Asset Management Co (GS.N); Pacific Investment Management Co and Wellington Management Co as managers to run the program.

The Fed from Jan. 5 to Jan. 28 purchased $69.4 billion of mortgage bonds guaranteed by Fannie Mae FNM.P, Freddie Mac FRE.P or government agencies such as the Federal Housing Administration.

Custodians provide fund accounting and administration and securities services to investors. JPMorgan has more than $14 trillion of assets under custody, according to its Web site. (Reporting by Al Yoon; Editing by James Dalgleish)

entry.headline: Mitsubishi Electric Automation Introduces Real-Time Factory Data Solution for Maximo and other IBM SOA Applications
entry.body: This groundbreaking solution for manufacturing enables real-time, evidence-based decision making to support production and operations improvement VERNON HILLS, Ill.--(Business Wire)-- Mitsubishi Electric Automation, Inc., a premier industrial automation company, will introduce its new MES Interface IT appliance at the PULSE 2009 Conference in Las Vegas. This new product enables low risk integration of real-time plant floor information to upper level computing applications, such as Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES). The product is the result of collaboration between Mitsubishi Electric Corporation and IBM. The new MES Interface IT is the next step in the Mitsubishi Electric e-F@ctory Initiative - the corporation`s vision for a unified enterprise achieved through improved business visibility of manufacturing and processing operations. To make this vision a reality, Mitsubishi Electric works with strategic partners to incorporate best-in-class solutions into the e-F@ctory architecture. Two of these solutions are IBM Maximo and the IBM Manufacturing Information Framework. "A key challenge to the adoption of direct factory connectivity has been the complexity and cost of integration between the manufacturing floor and business systems, which tend to structure and operate quite differently," said Trayton Jay, Mitsubishi Electric Automation e-F@ctory manager. "Our new e-F@ctory product addresses this issue by simplifying the connectivity across a wide range of production assets and abstracting this equipment to the level of a service in the business SOA infrastructure. In essence the MES Interface IT enables factory equipment to speak SOA." The Mitsubishi Electric e-F@ctory solution offers a number of advantages over traditional manufacturing data integration methodologies. MES Interface IT requires much less integration effort at both the factory and IT levels, which reduces implementation time and risk. The solution improves security and standardization and fosters more productive collaboration between factory and IT resources. MES Interface IT is designed to handle the high level of data processing and interaction necessary to cover both present and future needs. Those interested in learning more can visit the e-F@ctory page of the Mitsubishi Electric Automation website www.meau.com. To locate the nearest distributor or Mitsubishi Electric Automation technical sales person and learn more about the company`s high-reliability and low total-cost-of-ownership automation products and systems, visit the Contact Us page on the Mitsubishi Electric Automation website www.meau.com. About Mitsubishi Electric Automation, Inc. Mitsubishi Electric Automation, Inc., in Vernon Hills, IL, offers a comprehensive line of factory automation solutions. Products include automation platforms, programmable logic controllers, human machine interfaces (HMI), AC variable frequency drives, servo amplifiers and motors, motion controllers, control software, computerized numerical control systems (CNC), robots, and industrial sewing machines. For a broad range of factory automation applications, visit the Mitsubishi Electric Automation web site at www.meau.com. Mitsubishi Electric Automation Lori A. Bacharz, 847-478-2417 Lori.Bacharz@meau.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: UPDATE 2-JP Morgan cuts European telecoms sector to neutral
entry.body:
(Adds link to bank's move back towards cyclicals; details)

LONDON Feb 3 (Reuters) - J.P.Morgan downgraded the European telecoms sector to "neutral" from "overweight" on Tuesday, saying that although it still believed in the resilience of the sector it was slowly moving back into more cyclical stocks.

"It is important to emphasise that our strategists' call is motivated by a positive call on other cyclicals, not by concerns over the value or resilience of the European telecoms sector," the bank's analysts wrote in a note.

The bank said it was encouraged to return to other cyclicals by an expected slowdown in the rate of economic deterioration, a stabilising credit backdrop, aggressive fiscal and monetary policy action and a steepening yield curve.

While there is risk that telecoms sector revenues could fall short of expectations due to the depth of the downturn, other generic risk drivers, such as mergers and acquisitions or regulations, had improved, the analysts said.

They added that current market circumstances offered opportunities for operators to protect free cash flows.

Vodafone (VOD.L) and Deutsche Telekom (DTEGn.DE) offer the best value of the large caps, in the analysts' view, and they also recommended KPN (KPN.AS), OTE (OTEr.AT), Telekom Austria (TELA.VI), Bouygues (BOUY.PA) and the satellite/cable subsector. (Reporting by Georgina Prodhan in London and Sandhya Menon in Bangalore, editing by Will Waterman)

entry.headline: Procter & Gamble Lowers Sales-Growth Outlook After 53% Jump in 2Q09 Profit, an Industrial Info News Alert
entry.body: SUGAR LAND, TX, Feb 03 (MARKET WIRE) -- Researched by Industrial Info Resources (Sugar Land, Texas) -- Consumer-goods manufacturer Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) (Cincinnati, Ohio) has posted a second-quarter 2009 net income of $5 billion, up 53% compared with $3.27 billion year over year, aided by the sale of its Folgers business to the J.M. Smucker Company (NYSE:SJM) (Orrville, Ohio) in November. Procter & Gamble's capital spending is at 3.4% of sales for the fiscal year to date, Chief Financial Officer Jon Moeller said. He said that plan is consistent with the company's 4% target for the year. As part of our North American Industrial Database, Industrial Info is tracking three active Procter & Gamble projects. The largest of the projects is a $30 million product line addition at a powder-detergents and fabric-softener plant. For details, view the entire article by subscribing to Industrial Info's Premium Industry News at http://www.industrialinfo.com/showNews.jsp?newsitemID=143440, or browse other breaking industrial news stories at www.industrialinfo.com. Industrial Info Resources (IIR) is a marketing information service specializing in industrial process, energy and financial related markets with products and services ranging from industry news, analytics, forecasting, plant and project databases, as well as multimedia services. For more information send inquiries to industrialmanufacturing@industrialinfo.com or visit us online at www.industrialinfo.com. entry.headline: IBM Delivers New Talent Management Service for Mid-Market Companies
entry.body: ARMONK, NY, Feb 03 (MARKET WIRE) -- IBM (NYSE: IBM) today announced it has tailored its human capital management consulting services for the mid-market by teaming with Lawson Software to help smaller companies meet their unique challenges in maximizing employee potential. Effective people management is critical in today's economic climate, as a recent IBM study concluded, companies that manage talent well have better financial performance than their peers. The Mid-Market Workforce Effectiveness service combines IBM's extensive human resource expertise with Lawson's Strategic Human Capital Management suite from Lawson software. It is a blend of services and software than can be hosted. Processes addressed by this service include payroll, benefits, recruiting, talent management, employee self service and succession planning. "The combination of Lawson's core technology and IBM's mid-market service delivery model will allow our clients to deliver HR services to their employees much more effectively and efficiently than ever before," said Tim Ringo, global vice president, Human Capital Management, IBM. "In today's climate, where it is essential to do more with less, this delivery model is the cornerstone of creating an organization that is as lean and productive as possible." IBM's Mid-Market Workforce Effectiveness service offers the advantages of smart human resource management services which previously have been available to large global companies. IBM is harnessing years of experience gained from improving HR service delivery within large global enterprises now for the benefit of smaller companies' bottom line. IBM's approach offers workforce measurement capabilities that are aligned with business goals to drive workforce performance and business results. The service is further enabled by best-in-class mid-market workforce measurement tools developed by Lawson and the integration of effective business processes. It is a packaging of software and services to deliver high-value consulting that provides a quantifiable ROI with expedited results. "Working with IBM, we can provide transformational HR solutions to help strengthen organizations during the tight economy," said Larry Dunivan, senior vice president of Global Human Capital Management Products for Lawson. About IBM For workforce strategy and information, please visit www.ibm.com/gbs/humancapital For more information on IBM solutions for the mid-market, visit www.ibm.com/expressadvantage Contact: Jan Walbridge IBM Media Relations 203 430 9874 walbridge@us.ibm.com Copyright 2009, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: BQE Software Achieved Gold Certified Partner Status in Microsoft Partner Program
entry.body: LOS ANGELES, Feb. 3, 2009 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- BQE Software Inc., the makers of BillQuick, time tracking, billing and project management solutions, announced today that it has achieved the Gold Certified Partner status in the Microsoft Certified Partner (MCP) program with a competency in ISV/Software Solutions. As a Gold Certified Partner, BQE Software Inc. is recognized as demonstrating the highest level of competence and expertise with Microsoft technologies and is authorized to provide consulting, training, implementation, maintenance and support when assisting its customers. "Microsoft Gold Certified Partner status is an important milestone for BQE Software. It underscores BillQuick's leadership role within time billing and project management solutions and our expertise and strong relationship with Microsoft," said Shafat Qazi, Founder & CEO of BQE Software Inc. "We will continue to focus on leveraging new technologies to develop cutting-edge, reliable, scalable and cost-effective software solutions to businesses throughout the world." The Microsoft Partner Program represents Microsoft's ongoing commitment to the success of partners worldwide. The program recognizes partner expertise, rewards the total impact that partners have in the technology marketplace, and delivers more value to help partners' businesses be successful. The Gold partner level is the highest level offered by Microsoft to the best of the breed technology companies. About BQE Software: BQE Software's time billing and project management solution creates competitive advantage for professional service providers such as attorneys, engineers, architects, CPAs and IT consultants. BQE's flagship product, BillQuick, combines precision time tracking and intelligent invoicing with powerful project management and reporting tools -- together delivering a complete solution that is priced to deliver quick return on investment. Widely regarded as the most comprehensive time billing system on the market today, BillQuick integrates seamlessly with popular accounting programs including QuickBooks by Intuit Software, Microsoft Office Accounting (Nasdaq:MSFT), Peachtree Accounting by Sage (LSE:SGE.L) and more. To experience BillQuick, download a fully-functional trial or take a hands-on guided tour: www.bqe.com/Walkthru, contact BillQuick Sales at sales@bqe.com or call 1-888-245-5669. The BillQuick logo is available at http://www.globenewswire.com/newsroom/prs/?pkgid=3983 -0- CONTACT: BQE Software Inc. Angelo Lillo, Marketing Director (310) 602-4010 angelo@bqe.com

entry.headline: IBM Raises the Bar on Security Testing
entry.body: ATLANTA, GA, Feb 03 (MARKET WIRE) -- IBM (NYSE: IBM) announced today it is the first vendor to commit to monthly testing to measure the security effectiveness across its entire product portfolio. The testing will be conducted by NSS Labs, a leading global independent testing lab that focuses on security product testing and certification. At the same time, IBM Internet Security Systems (ISS) is announcing results from its latest NSS Labs Security Update Monitor (SUM) report from December that showed 100 percent protection against tested exploits. IBM ISS began measuring the effectiveness of its security products in 2002 to ensure its strong research and development arm was keeping up with the ever evolving threat landscape. In late 2008 the company chose to test its entire portfolio of products, from its unified threat management tool to host and network security, for third-party validation across its product portfolio. In addition to security effectiveness testing, IBM ISS submitted the IBM ISS Proventia Server for Windows 2.0 and the Proventia Multifunction Gateway products for PCI suitability testing to verify the presence of functionality required by the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS). "Because cybercrime evolves at such a fast pace, security tools and companies must constantly prove their effectiveness," said Rick Moy, President of NSS Labs. "The IBM GX6116 Network IPS product showed 100 percent accuracy in protecting against the latest threats selected by NSS in December 2008, up from 96% in November. IBM has set the bar incredibly high. Together, IBM and NSS Labs encourage the rest of the industry to monthly test their entire product portfolios and use this healthy competition to drive even greater innovation." The December SUM report was based on testing of IBM ISS' Proventia Network IPS security product against the current set of threats. NSS Labs used a range of threats against the most common applications and operating systems spanning as far back as four years to reflect some of the most current attacks as well as older threats which are still prevalent. The full SUM report can be found at: http://nsslabs.com/IPS-SUM/ibm-iss-proventia-nips-gx6116-2008-december.html In addition to IBM ISS' significant SUM results, in April 2008, NSS Labs validated the comprehensive PCI DSS functionality support in both the Proventia Multifunction Gateway and Proventia Server for Windows 2.0. And late last year NSS Labs also tested IBM ISS Proventia Server for Windows 2.0 which was found to detect and block 98.5 percent of all attacker initiated exploits. The combination of these tests shows a commitment to increase the security for each of the IBM ISS products as well as ensuring that the proper features are in place to help customers demonstrate security compliance. "Monthly testing isn't only a call to the industry to raise the bar, but a commitment to our customers to keep reducing the cost and complexity of security," said Greg Adams, director of product and services management at IBM ISS. "Everything we do is intended to ease the lives of our customers and this is one more step in taking the burden off of their shoulders." IBM is the world's leading provider of risk and security solutions. Clients around the world work with IBM to help reduce the complexities of security and strategically manage risk. IBM's experience and range of risk and security solutions are unsurpassed -- from dedicated research, software, hardware, services and global Business Partner value -- helping clients secure business operations and implement company-wide, integrated risk management programs. About NSS Labs Founded in 1991, NSS Labs is a globally recognized leader in independent security and performance testing and certification. NSS Labs performs among the most comprehensive, high-performance security validation in the industry. Our proven methodologies reflect real-world traffic and usage conditions, helping information security professionals understand how products will work in their environments. NSS is a participating organization in the PCI Security Standards Council and a member of AMTSO. For more information, visit: www.nsslabs.com. About IBM For more information about IBM, please visit www.ibm.com Media Contact: Michele Mancuso O'Malley Media Relations 917-472-3692 mmancus@us.ibm.com Copyright 2009, Market Wire, All rights reserved. -0-

entry.headline: Former IBM Executive Diana Hage Hired as Chief Executive Officerat RFID Global Solution, Inc.
entry.body: Former IBM Global Wireless Services and ODIN Executive Joins RFIDGS ELDERSBURG, Md. & RESTON, Va.--(Business Wire)-- RFID Global Solution, Inc., the leading provider of asset visibility solutions for defense, government and commercial clients, has named former IBM executive Diana Hage as Chief Executive Officer. Ms. Hage joins RFIDGS after serving as ODIN technologies head of European operations and Chief Operating Officer, and IBM`s Director, Global Wireless Services. "We are extremely pleased to have an executive of Ms. Hage`s caliber and experience join the RFID Global Solution team," said Thomas M. Manzagol, Chairman, Board of Directors, RFIDGS. "Diana`s experience is focused on leading large, global services organizations and high-tech start-ups in emerging technology markets. Ms. Hage has significant expertise in building RFID solutions that deliver measurable ROI and business value, and brings with her a deep understanding of RF applications in Aerospace and Government. Ms. Hage`s leadership, experience and strategic direction is already transforming a cutting-edge RF engineering firm into a market-focused, global solutions provider." Ms. Hage has a proven track record for growing businesses into large, revenue-generating industry leaders. At IBM, Ms. Hage was the executive responsible for the strategy and growth of IBM`s enterprise mobility, wireless, and RFID services business. She also held executive positions in Corporate Strategy, Global Services Strategy, and Global Business Services. Diana joined ODIN technologies in 2006, where she was responsible for professional services, European operations, and key accounts in Aerospace and Healthcare. As the Chief Executive Officer at RFIDGS, Ms. Hage will be responsible for the company`s long-term expansion plan and execution strategy, as well as increasing revenue and profitability. "RFIDGS is leading the industry with its innovative, patented software and hardware solutions for asset tracking and visibility, and its expertise in integrating diverse technologies such as active and passive RFID, GPS, cellular and satellite communications," said Ms. Hage. "I look forward to adding my experience and specific market knowledge to this world-class team of RF pioneers and innovators." Ms. Hage has an MBA from the Darden School of Business and a BA from the University of Virginia. About RFID Global Solution, Inc. RFID Global Solution, Inc. is the leading provider of asset visibility solutions for defense, government and commercial clients. RFIDGS delivers enterprise asset visibility and the widest range of sensory data from active and passive RFID, GPS and Cellular technologies, in its award-winning, patented turnkey and custom products. RFIDGS provides asset tracking and visibility solutions to Aerospace & Defense, Government, Manufacturing, Transportation, and the Art & High Value Asset markets. RFIDGS` focus is on asset tracking, location awareness, security and supply chain visibility for high-value assets, tools, parts and supplies. For more information, visit rfidgs.com. entry.headline: J.P. Morgan Selected by the Federal Reserve as Custodian for Its Mortgage-Backed Securities Purchase Program
entry.body: NEW YORK--(Business Wire)-- J.P. Morgan today announced that it has been selected by the Federal Reserve to serve as custodian for its program to purchase mortgage-backed securities (MBS). The program, which began on January 5, 2009, will purchase up to $500 billion in MBS that are backed by Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac and Ginnie Mae. The goal of the program, which was originally announced on November 25, 2008, is to provide support to mortgage and housing markets and to foster improved conditions in financial markets more generally. Via a competitive process, the Federal Reserve selected four investment managers - BlackRock Financial Management, Inc., Goldman Sachs Asset Management, L.P., Pacific Investment Management Company LLC (PIMCO), and Wellington Management Company, LLP - and a custodian - J.P. Morgan - to implement the program. The selection criteria were based on each institution`s operational capacity, size and overall experience in the MBS market. "We are proud to have been selected by the Federal Reserve for this important initiative," said Conrad Kozak, CEO of J.P. Morgan Worldwide Securities Services. "We are pleased to be able to support the efficient operation of the MBS program, while at the same time minimizing operational and financial risks." For more information, please visit the Federal Reserve Bank of New York Web site for a list of FAQs on the MBS program. For more information on J.P. Morgan`s Custody solutions, please visit www.jpmorgan.com/visit/wss. About JPMorgan Worldwide Securities Services J.P. Morgan Worldwide Securities Services (WSS) is a premier securities servicing provider that helps institutional investors, alternative asset managers, broker dealers and equity issuersoptimize efficiency, mitigate risk and enhance revenue. A division of JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. (NYSE: JPM), WSS leverages the firm`s unparalleled scale, leading technology and deep industry expertise to service investments around the world. It has $13.2 trillion in assets under custody and $5.4 trillion in assets under administration. For more information, go to www.jpmorgan.com/visit/wss. About JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM), is a leading global financial services firm with assets of $2.2 trillion and operations in more than 60 countries. The firm is a leader in investment banking, financial services for consumers, small business and commercial banking, financial transaction processing, asset management, and private equity. A component of the Dow Jones Industrial Average, JPMorgan Chase & Co. serves millions of consumers in the United States and many of the world`s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under its J.P. Morgan, Chase, and Washington Mutual brands. Information about JPMorgan Chase & Co. is available at www.jpmorganchase.com. Media: JPMorgan Chase & Co. John Johmann, +1 212-270-8371 john.johmann@jpmorgan.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: New Report Shows 92 Percent of Critical Microsoft Vulnerabilities are Mitigated by Eliminating Admin Rights
entry.body: BeyondTrust Analysis of All 2008 Microsoft Security Bulletins Finds Vast Majority of Vulnerabilities can be Diminished by Configuring End Users as Standard Users PORTSMOUTH, N.H.--(Business Wire)-- BeyondTrust Corporation, the first provider of Least Privilege Management solutions, today published research findings stating that the removal of administrator rights from Windows users is a mitigating factor for the vast majority of all Microsoft software vulnerabilities reported by Microsoft in 2008. The results demonstrate that by configuring users as standard users, companies can better protect themselves against malware and zero-day threats. Complete findings and methodology can be found online in a new report, titled "Reducing the Threat from Microsoft Vulnerabilities." BeyondTrust`s findings show that among the 2008 Microsoft vulnerabilities given a "critical" severity rating, 92 percent shared the same best practice advice from Microsoft to mitigate the vulnerability: "Users whose accounts are configured to have fewer user rights on the system could be less impacted than users who operate with administrative user rights." This language, found in the "Mitigating Factors" portion of Microsoft`s security bulletins, also appears as a recommendation for reducing the threat from nearly 70 percent of all vulnerabilities reported in 2008. Other key findings from BeyondTrust`s report show that removing administrator rights will better protect companies against the exploitation of: * 94 percent of Microsoft Office vulnerabilities reported in 2008 * 89 percent of Internet Explorer vulnerabilities reported in 2008 * 53 percent of Microsoft Windows vulnerabilities reported in 2008. Further illustrating the benefits to enterprises of removing administrator rights from users, a recent Gartner report states: "The Gartner TCO model shows a significant reduction in TCO between a managed desktop where the user is an administrator, compared with a desktop where the user is a standard user. Among the most remarkable observations is that the model shows a 24 percent decrease in the amount of IT labor needed for technical support." Gartner, Inc., "Organizations That Unlock PCs Unnecessarily Will Face High Costs," Michael A. Silver, Ronni J. Colville, Dec.19, 2008. "Companies face imminent danger from zero-day threats as new vulnerabilities continually crop up while patching efforts lag behind, and even worse, many threats exist undetected," said John Moyer, CEO of BeyondTrust. "Our findings reflect the critical role that restricting administrator rights plays in protecting against these types of threats. This is achievable in one simple step-adopting a strategy of Least Privilege security. BeyondTrust has helped over 500 companies equip their end users with those privileges needed to do their jobs, while protecting against zero-day threats and reducing risk." BeyondTrust`s report, "Reducing the Threat from Microsoft Vulnerabilities," is accessible at the following link: http://www.beyondtrust.com/documentation/whitePapers/wp_VulnerabilityReport.pdf. About BeyondTrust BeyondTrust Corporation, a pioneer in Least Privilege Management, enables enterprises to move beyond the need to trust users with excess privileges or administrator rights. BeyondTrust Privilege Manager was the first product to enable the security best practice of Least Privilege in Windows environments by allowing administrators to assign end-users permissions for required or selected applications. With Privilege Manager organizations can remove administrator rights and still allow end-users to run all required Windows applications, processes and ActiveX controls. By eliminating the need to grant administrator rights to end-users, IT departments can create a more secure, compliant and standard environment. More than 500 organizations worldwide in virtually every vertical industry rely on BeyondTrust Privilege Manager to secure their enterprises. For more information, please visit www.beyondtrust.com or register for a webinar at www.beyondtrust.com/events/. Schwartz Communications Dave Bowker or Tiffany Archambault 781-684-0770 BeyondTrust@schwartz-pr.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.author: None
entry.headline: Exxon Torrance reports maintenance-linked flaring
entry.body:
NEW YORK Feb 3 (Reuters) - Oil major Exxon Mobil Corp's (XOM.N) 150,000 barrel per day Los Angeles-area refinery in Torrance, California reported flaring late Monday linked to maintenance work, according to a filing.

The refinery exceeded certain emissions limits "due to a plant flaring event from maintenance activity," according to the filing with the California Emergency Management Agency.

The filing said "the refinery continues to operate" but gave no further details.

Exxon has begun an overhaul of the refinery's 100,200 bpd gasoline-producing fluidic catalytic cracker Dec. 30. The hydrotreater, alkylation unit and a sulfur recovery unit were included in the overhaul which the company has said early last month was due to last a few weeks. (Reporting by Haitham Haddadin; Editing by John Picinich)

entry.author: None
entry.headline: IBM computer will have power of 2 million laptops
entry.body:
SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) - Seven months after IBM delivered the world's fastest supercomputer, it has announced an even speedier one with the computing power of 2 million laptops.

IBM said on Tuesday it is developing the technology for its new Sequoia computer, with delivery scheduled in 2011 to the Department of Energy for use at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory.

Sequoia will chug along at 20 petaflops per second and is one order of magnitude quicker than its predecessor. The earlier machine, delivered in June to the Energy Department, broke the 1 petaflop barrier.

Peta is a term for quadrillion and FLOP stands for floating point operations per second.

Sequoia, and a smaller computer called Dawn, are being built in Rochester, Minnesota, for use in simulating nuclear tests. IBM says they can also be used for complex tasks like weather forecasting or oil exploration.

IBM says Sequoia will be highly energy-efficient for the job it does but even so will occupy 96 refrigerator-sized racks in an area the size of a big house -- 3,422 square feet (318 square meters).

(Reporting by David Lawsky, Editing by Sandra Maler)

FILED UNDER:

entry.headline: Microsoft, Alchemy Solutions and Crystal Cruises Explain How to Modernize-as-You-Migrate from the Mainframe to .NET
entry.body: Unique webinar demonstrates how mainframe businesses can succeed in today`s tough economic environment BEND, Ore.--(Business Wire)-- Alchemy Solutions, Inc., (www.alchemysolutions.com) provider of legacy modernization solutions for Microsoft`s .NET Framework, in association with Microsoft will offer a unique opportunity to hear how Crystal Cruises successfully moved from their legacy mainframe to a modern .NET environment. The webinar will be held on 12th February at 8:00 am Pacific, see below for registration details. In this webinar, titled "Exploring a Successful Modernization Project from Mainframe to .NET", Boban Dragojilovic, vice president of computer services at Crystal Cruises, provides a white-board-aided explanation of their migration process, including the resulting architecture and modernization benefits of the Crystal Cruises move to .NET from the mainframe. Scott Rosenbloom, legacy modernization manager, Microsoft Corporation, will set the scene with an overview of the opportunities provided by this type of legacy modernization solution. Crystal Cruises, a luxury cruise line, operated its ships with aging IBM 3090 mainframes that were tough to integrate with other systems, expensive, slow to operate - and about to fall out of service. Recognizing the opportunity to modernize while also avoiding an expensive upgrade, Crystal Cruises chose to port its custom code to a Microsoft ASP.NET solution using Alchemy Solutions tools. This move was accomplished for about one fifth of the price of the mainframe upgrade. Modernized applications now easily integrate with off-the-shelf products and Crystal Cruise employees are enjoying the benefits of modern tools such as graphical data views and navigation. Additionally, the new solution provided dramatic performance improvements. In one example, a process that used to take an hour now completes in 90 seconds enabling the adoption of more effective business processes. "The case for moving mainframe applications to .NET has never been stronger. With the current state of the economy, this option demands serious consideration as it can provide better performance and future prospects while saving organizations money," comments Ron Langer. "Boban Dragojilovic at Crystal Cruises managed the move for their applications and has some great information and experiences to share. We are sure that both IT and business executives will find this webinar informative and time well spent." Crystal Cruises used the Neo family of products from Alchemy Solutions including: * NeoKicks - bringing CICS applications to the .NET world in a simple, stream-lined fashion that web-enables the screens, provides .NET scalability and positions the applications to take full advantage of the .NET Framework. * NeoBatch - migrating batch JCL to Windows. * NetCOBOL - providing the foundation of runtime-free, rock-steady reliable, compilation and execution of COBOL programs. For a synopsis of Crystal Cruises experience see the Silverlight presentation at: http://www.microsoft.com/heroeshappenhere/crystal/default.html To register for the webinar please visit : http://msevents.microsoft.com/CUI/EventDetail.aspx?EventID=1032402150=en-US Don`t miss this opportunity to understand the challenges faced by Crystal Cruises and how they turned those challenges into a great opportunity using Alchemy tools and expertise. About Alchemy Solutions Alchemy Solutions (www.alchemysolutions.com) is a leading provider of technology solutions that help organizations integrate legacy applications with the latest Microsoft Windows technologies, including Visual Studio and the .NET Framework. The company`s technology enables significant cost savings by moving applications and data from expensive mainframe platforms to cost-effective Windows environments. The Alchemy Solutions suite includes NeoKicks, NeoBatch, NeoSort and NeoData enabling the modernization of mission critical CICS and batch applications within the Microsoft .NET environment. Additionally, Alchemy Solutions, and its worldwide network of partners, distribute the Fujitsu NetCOBOL family of runtime-free COBOL compilers outside of Japan. Alchemy Solutions, Inc. is a privately held corporation with headquarters in Bend, Oregon. The company resulted from the 2008 acquisition of the Legacy Modernization Group of Fujitsu Computer Systems. Fujitsu and NetCOBOL are registered trademarks of Fujitsu Ltd. in the United States and other countries. Alchemy Solutions, NeoKicks, NeoBatch, NeoSort and NeoData are trademarks or registered trademarks of Alchemy Solutions, Inc. in the United States and other countries. Rivercalm Jenny Swift, 917-210-8064 swift@rivercalm.com Copyright Business Wire 2009

entry.headline: Robbins-Gioia Named One of 50 Microsoft Managed National Systems Integrator Partners Nationwide
entry.body: Company Also Selected for Enterprise Project Management Partner Advisory Council ALEXANDRIA, Va.--(Business Wire)-- Robbins-Gioia, LLC, the leading provider of program management (PM) consulting solutions, announced today that it has been named one of 50 Microsoft managed National Systems Integrator (NSI) partners nationwide. This status reflects Robbins-Gioia`s role as a trusted Microsoft advisor with the goal of even further expanding its Microsoft business practice. Currently, Robbins-Gioia has multiple engagements providing services to its clients via Microsoft technology. Specific NSI requirements include having a Gold Certification in the Microsoft Partner Program, possessing national delivery capability, and delivering solutions based on Microsoft technologies. Robbins-Gioia just renewed its Gold Certified Partner membership for the fourth year. Concurrently, Robbins-Gioia was also selected for a fourth year to serve on the Microsoft Enterprise Project Management Partner Advisory Council (EPM PAC) as one of 20 partners in the program. "We are honored to be nominated and selected for these programs reserved for the top Microsoft-related service providers in the United States," said Jon Hughes, vice president, Robbins-Gioia Technology Solutions Group. "We are committed to the goals of the NSI partnership, which are important to us strategically and tactically. And we take our responsibilities as an EPM PAC member very seriously. Our large and varied EPM client base and experience give us the insight to communicate directly to Microsoft on the state of the platform, make recommendations on EPM software, and provide alpha and beta testing support. In both of these roles-as an NSI partner and EPM PAC member-our mission is to work closely with our clients using Microsoft technologies to help them apply these products to their best business advantage." "At Microsoft, we realize that business solutions promote adoption of services and software," said Greg Urquhart, General Manager US ISV and National SI Organization. "We think Robbins-Gioia`s integrated solutions on the Microsoft platform result in valuable products for our clients and the marketplace." About Robbins-Gioia, LLC Robbins-Gioia has been dedicated to delivering management consulting solutions to government agencies and Fortune 500 companies since 1980. Robbins-Gioia combines thought leadership, disciplined processes, industry-based knowledge, and integrated tools to help global customers optimize their business processes, accelerate change, and establish time, cost, and quality improvements to transform their businesses. For more information, please call Robbins-Gioia, LLC at 800-663-7138, or visit the web site at www.robbinsgioia.com. Robbins-Gioia, LLC Grace Jones Robbins, 703-739-6104 or O`Keeffe & Company Evan Lapiska, 703-883-9000 ext. 140 Copyright Business Wire 2009
